# 𒍨 ZIB₂ 7 ZIQ ZIG ZIK

𒍨 ≈ 𒋰𒌋𒋰·𒌍

𒍨 ≈ 𒉒·𒌍

𒍨 ≈ 𒍫 ZIQ ≈ ZU

𒍨 ZIQ 𒍠 ZAG 𒍮 «Zeugnis» sign, mark, token, colour, paint •šrib @ zebra 𒍦 𒌍

𒍨 ZIQ 𒍠 ZAG Zügel жүгөн Zaumzeug "donkey-bridle" #zib₂ <> صُرْع ṣurʕ srian սանձ sanj suitset узда

𒍨 ḫaš₂ ≈ 𓃗 horse in 𒍨𒁁 ḫaš₂bad 𓃗𓂾 "gallop" 𒍨𒁍 haš₂puˡ "pull the reins" 𒍨𒁍 ZIQ… zügeln

𒍨 ḫaš₂ ≈ 𒍮 haš₄ hips

𒍨 = 𒍦 ZIB₂ Ziffer (cipher) symbol

𒍨 ZIQ 敷居 shikii soglia босагъа bosağa < շեմք šemkʿ / slīksnis "threshold" > Zügel? seuil Schwelle
𒍨 ZIQ zog sogh > ZIB₂ zob soph סַף "threshold"

𒍨 ZIB₂ ზღურბლი zɣurbli "threshold"

𒍨 zig #ziqqu eşik@Turk "threshold"

𒍨 = 𒍦 zibʳ ≈ capre 🐐 𓃶

𒍨 Zicken-Haar & Ziegen-Bart 🐐 𓃶 𒈧 ⇔ Zoonk 𓋹
𒍨𒉌 ziqni "hair" 𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥
𒍨𒉡 ziq-nu жакӏьа žaḳ’a •zakna жакӀэ žāč̣̍ăᵒⁿ
𒍨𒉡 ziqnu "beard"

𒍨 zib₂ צֶבַע tséva صَبَغَ ṣabaḡa צְבַע ṣəbaʿ “to dip, to dye” ጸብኀ ṣäbḫä 𒍝𒁍𒌑 /ṣabû/, “to soak, to bathe” < soap

𒍨 zib₂ The seven colors צֶבַע tséva цвят cvjat 色巴 sèbā 𓃹 ⲁⲟⲩⲁⲛ ⲁⲃⲁⲛ Farben 𓇋𓃹𓈖

𒍨 ḫaš₂ = 𒍮 ḫaš₄ crotch, 𒍮 ZIG = thigh, abdomen, lower body
𒍮 haš4 𒍨 haš₂ has @ Hun! ϩⲏ hēˢ ሆድ hodˢʰ "abdomen" ᎤᏍᏉᎵ ʰusquoli উদর ʰudor ʰvatsa
𒍮 haš4 𒍨 haš₂ cosa coscia coxa cuisse quisse 𐎌𐎖 ha.šq “hip” Hüfts "abdomen; thigh"
𒍮 haš4 𒍨 haš₂ •cost kõht 𓄡𓏏 ẖt
𒍮 haš₄ 𒍮𒆪 hasch häsch "holds"

𒍨 zib₂ The seven colors:

𒌓 (babbar) bright white
𒈪 (giggi) gray black
𒋜 (su₄ /su/) shining red / hand brown ⇔ chirmes
𒅊 (sig₇ /sig/) shining yellow/green
𒁱 (dara₄ /dara/) red deer 𓂧 𓈙 𓂋 𓅟
𒍝𒆳 (za-gin₃ /zagin/) 𒍝𒆳 za-kur azur
𒄭𒈨𒁕 (ḫe-me-da /ḫemeda/) blood purple / pink

𒍨 zib₂ symbol :
𒍨 zib₂ /zib/ mark, token, colour, paint

𒍨𒋾𒅁 si-ik-ti
𒋛𒅅𒋾 zik-ti-ip
sikti; zikti; осикта osikta tip ܛܦܪܐ ṭep̄rā ظُفْر Tungusic *xosïkta "nail" @ Sibir ⇔ Siegel?

𒀭𒍨 an-zib2 "an epithet of Inana" 8+7 = 15 𒀭𒌋𒐊 ᵈ15 fünfteenᵘˢ Venus
